TitleEnglish: The Banished Court Magician Aims to Become the Strongest
SummaryEnglish: Once a loyal court magician supporting the crown prince from behind the scenes, Alec Ygret is cast aside and exiled for only knowing support magic. But just as he hits rock bottom, he reunites with Yorha Eisentz, a former comrade from the legendary party Lasting Period. Invited to rejoin the team that once made history, Alec returns to dungeon explorationâ€”and begins a new chapter in his life!
Aliases: Mikata ga Yowasugite Hojo Mahou ni Tesshiteita Kyuutei Mahoushi, Tsuihou sarete Saikyou wo Mezashimasu
A Court Magician, Who Was Focused on Supportive Magic Because His Allies Were Too Weak, Aims to Become the Strongest After Being Banished

1.SummaryEnglish: Court magician Alec is banished by an angry prince.

2.SummaryEnglish: Alec is reunited with his old party and becomes an adventurer once more.

3.SummaryEnglish: Alec heads into a dungeon for the first time since joining Lasting Period.
